text: is a Japanese racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . He rode in the men's team pursuit event at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships.Start list ==Major results== ;2015 : 1st Road race, Asian Junior Cycling Championships : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;2019 : 1st Prologue Tour de Kumano ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan
title: Keitaro Sawada
